name: LAMUNATION! -international
description:
The "CH" stands for "The Crystal Heart".


Rayla "MC" Prateado : Domo arigato Ms. Perfect.

The sole chef of the Cherry Crown Diner.
Everything she does, she does to perfection.
She's gentle, and reliable, and she loves everyone.
The "MC" stands for "The Million Carat".


Luna Akahoshi : Good guy in the jacuzzi.

He's always chilling in the jacuzzi at home with his best friend, a rubber duckie.
The goodest guy you'll ever meet.


Rubber Duckie : The real protagonist of our story.


Solaris : Say Hi.



Let's see what fabulous features we have in store for you:

  • All-ages version plus a free patch
  • Full Japanese voice acting
  • Memes
  • Japanese, Chinese and English text
  • More memes
  • An awesome 80’s-inspired soundtrack
  • A rubber duckie
  • Did we mention memes???
